page.description: The .SET_CURSOR() method sets the position of the cursor in an RTF Memo field.

argument.name: Location
argument.description: The new character position of the cursor. The position before the first character in the control is 1.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example sets the cursor position in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.set_cursor(10)
